meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kristi Springer Roger Mueller-Kim Fred Cofone Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6080.

td.p: Kristi Springer, a proposal writer from Naperville, Illinois
Roger Mueller-Kim, a high school social studies teacher from Dublin, California
Fred Cofone, a copy editor from Old Greenwich, Connecticut (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,400)

tr.td: GOLF
GREENS
HAZARDS
CLUBS
BIRDIE
"FORE"!

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Fred
Roger
Kristi
(Alex: A tribute to their series [*] which airs Wednesday nights on PBS.)
"Q" FOOD & DRINK
(Alex: Each correct response beginning with a "Q".)
POETS' MONOGRAMS
HAPPIER MOVIE ENDINGS
VI PACK
(Alex: You'll get a "six pack".)
COMPLETE THE OXYMORON
